comprehensive_overview: EasyBuild-ACES is a collection of EasyBuild framework recipes for building commonly used software packages within the Army Combat Capabilities Development Command Army Research Laboratory (CCDC-ARL) Computational and Information Sciences Directorate (CISD) Advanced Computing, Engineering and Software (ACES) research group.
core_features: EasyBuild-ACES provides recipes for building software packages often used by the CCDC-ARL CISD ACES research group, allowing for easy deployment and management of these tools.
